name: Asteroids Evolved
description:
Hello everyone!

I am uploading an old project in which I was assigned to create an Asteroids game with a twist. I have decided to add a leveling system, recources system and various other types of ships and weapons which will allow for a more varied play style.

I hope you all will enjoy playing this game! It can get pretty challenging!

Controls:
Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
Shoot: Space Bar

Any feedback is greatly appreciated!
